website_summaries.verdict: This projector is a durable little kid-friendly device.
pros: The star projector is compact and lightweight, which makes it easy to use around the house
4 different color lights to choose from and the device shuts off automatically after 45 minutes
cons: Uses a touch sensor that can be overly sensitive, and it doesn't rotate

customer_reviews.title: One of my daughter's favorite things. Whenever she goes to sleep
customer_reviews.text: One of my daughter's favorite things. Whenever she goes to sleep, she asks for "stars." I love that there are no moving parts, it shuts off after 45 minutes, and it's easy to clean. She loves to move it around while the stars are shining, and she has dropped it on the floor several times and it didn't break. She's under 2 years old but quickly learned how to activate her "stars". She can work it better than Daddy can, even in the dark. We've been using it for over a month and the first batteries are still going strong. We are so happy with it, we bought two more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Rampant Online Consumer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little star lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little star lamp. I was looking for something to help my kids fall asleep at night, but not be too bright. I also didn't want something big and bulky. This product was exactly what I had in mind. It has multiple colors you can choose from - orange, blue, green, and rotating colors. My kids like the blue because they are brighter, but the rotating option is pretty cool too. It has a timer that turns it off after 45 minutes. We bought it in December for Christmas Eve, and the batteries just ran out. If you are looking for a small, portable and whimsical star lamp this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Designed for German Distribution
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cute! I was kinda worried about all of the star led systems. This one looks good and was designed for European distro. Uses 3 AA batteries too. The fact that it was designed for German standards is comforting because I kinda get weird by all the cheaper designed items on the market that can leak battery acid. I don't want to be the reason why my little nephew got a skin burn was from some cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Eggs N Bacon

customer_reviews.title: 30minute timer only
customer_reviews.text: It's funny that I enjoy this more than my son. It measures around 8inches and has touch sensor on the side which is tough to locate sometimes in the dark.changes 3 colors blue,green & orange(lightest among three). Timed for 30minutes only so you'll need a night lamp if you wake up in the middle of night. Apart from that it's a decent product
customer_reviews.author: Skx

customer_reviews.title: Survived washing machine, very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my toddler to keep her in bed during night time so she can fall asleep sooner. Use it occasionally for 2 years when my lo is fuzzy and it still works!! A couple days ago I accidentally drop it into my washing machine and did a load of laundry with it. Thought it's a goner , but it works again today after its all dried. Feels like a miracle and made my day.
customer_reviews.author: Katye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver!!! Our 3 yr old developed a fear of the dark, but really needs a dark room to stay asleep. Enter this amazing little device! The stars are just the right brightness on the ceiling, we use the amber color as blue light is stimulating, and he loves falling asleep with his stars! I definitely wish I had had one of these when I was a kid who was afraid of the dark!
customer_reviews.author: HHarmon

customer_reviews.title: Love this little star night light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my then 2 yr old back in May 2015. It’s now July 2018 and this has withstood constant handling and play of two toddlers. I rarely have to change the batteries. It cycles through three cycles of colors : orange ,blue and green. You have the option to leave it on your favorite color of choice. It’s incredibly easy to use. It’s great for toddlers. You’ll want a different light for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Looked at many different items, and purchased a couple 'fails.' This product is great because it's not super bright but simply enough for extra light while falling asleep. I love that it doesn't stay on all night and shuts off after 45 minutes. Would recommend strongly.
customer_reviews.author: Petra Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Star light, star bright
customer_reviews.text: This light is adorable! It takes 3 AA batteries, so worrying about hanging cord or recharging. There is a button that you push to turn it on/off and to make it change colors. The button is the yellow circle with the little prince's face on it - and it's only slightly raised - so it doesn't stick out. This is a good quality product for the price. Perfect to give for a gift...I purchased this light & a "Little Prince" counting book for my nephew. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddiction

customer_reviews.title: For the money it is not a bad purchase, it could be better
customer_reviews.text: This touch light is alright. For the money it is not a bad purchase, it could be better. the button to turn the light on and off could use some work. It functions sporadically. It almost always turns on the first try, but when pressing the button subsequent times to change the color of the light it doesn't always work. Overall it's okay. It does a reasonable job of displaying stars on the walls and ceiling without any distortion to the stars. It is bright enough to see but not so bright that it lights up the room. It only stays on for a short period of time so it wouldn't be a great night light.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: A Star Is Born, and Giftable!
customer_reviews.text: My first son had one of these and loved it so much we had to get his little brother one. They both adore the ease of turning on the stars and picking the color. The batteries last a long time too, so you don't have to worry about constantly changing them.
customer_reviews.author: Linnea Covington

customer_reviews.title: While I can't decide which I like more (i like the physical buttons of the turtle ...
customer_reviews.text: We already have a Cloud B Twilight Sea Turtle for our daughter and decided to try something new for our infant son's room. While I can't decide which I like more (i like the physical buttons of the turtle and the color changing option of the le petit price), both are a wonderful option. With nightly use for the full 45 minutes (until it auto shuts off), rechargeable batteries last about 2 months before needing a recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W.

customer_reviews.title: very nice night light, but lights are dim, don't expect to read bedtime stories with the stars.
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves looking at the stars before bed, though it would be nice if it was bright enough to read a bedtime story as well (but I am not complaining :) . But it definitely is not bright enough for any reading, the stars are very dim and will cover the ceiling of a small room. I do feel you have to place the light in the center of the room, otherwise all the stars will just be illuminating one side of the room. The stars are very calming, though. My little ones love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dori O.

customer_reviews.title: Just as good at the Turtle, for half the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this - it's so cute! My oldest has used the turtle constellation for 6 years now - I always thought I could pass it down to my littlest, but he's too attached. I got my youngest a knock off from Christmas Tree Shop, because I didn't want to spend almost $40 on another turtle. Well, I got my money's worth with the knock off : / But this one is great! My littlest was so happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting it to be somewhat good quality with some weight to it
customer_reviews.text: looking at the initial price (much higher than other models), I was expecting it to be somewhat good quality with some weight to it. I got it yesterday and it was so light and felt pretty cheap. Also I was not expecting it to have the small screw to be unscrewed for the batteries. It is troublesome and the screw was so tight that zi could not untighten it. So I am returning it. If I had seen the lights I may have kept it. not sure.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have depression/anxiety and loved wishing on glow in the dark stars at home, but didn't want to take the time to put them up in my apartment. This light is perfect, stays on until I fall asleep and I love the different color options. The orange and green are my favorites. Seeing the stars also helps me relax when I am stressed and have become part of my nightly routine. Also, the light is not too bright and I can fall asleep before it turns off.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has a timer and will shut down ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter after she saw The Little Prince. She loves it! The stars are clear and bright. They are not laser clear, but are more than usual toys put out. I love that it has a timer and will shut down within 45 minutes on its own. She can change the colors to what she wants or have the colors morph on their own. Best gift I've gotten in a while. I'll be buying another for my other granddaughter now.
customer_reviews.author: totoz

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit smaller than I had imagined (I had not checked the dimensions before I ordered it), but it work wonderfully. The small size means it doesn't take up a lot of shelf space, but it still illuminates the room with a lot of stars. Light weight & seems reasonably durable, so I'm not worried about having my toddler knock it off the shelf accidentally. Exceeded my expectations in design & function, especially for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Grgich

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective star projection
customer_reviews.text: Simple and small battery operated design throws LED projected stars on your child's ceiling. Wide spread, and pretty bright. 3 color options plus a color changing setting. Touch control is tricky at first. When we first tried to turn ours it didn't seem to work. I opened the top and saw that the touch sensor had shifted. Slipped it back in place and it's been working great. It does not rotate or move, but that's totally okay. kind of perfect.
customer_reviews.author: bensani

customer_reviews.title: Great night light for kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this light. It's just enough light for him to settle down and go to sleep. Every night he picks a different color. My only suggestion would be to have a texture where the on button is so when it's the middle of the night it's easy to find; I put a small sticker on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Z

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It feels really flimsy but works great so far. I bought it as a 3rd birthday present for my son and he always asks to “push stars” before bedtime to turn it on. The setting where it changes colors is great- they slowly fade in and out so it’s very calming and I think helps him fall asleep faster. Haven’t had it long enough to comment on battery life or durability.
customer_reviews.author: B Clark

customer_reviews.title: Every child should have one of these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stars on the ceiling, stars on the floor, stars on my blankets, I want more. This has got to be the cutest little star box plus projector. It is super easy for little hands with a simple touch sensitive label. No buttons. Due to my expectations of a good projector should be ye big, I was surprised to see this handheld box light up my walls and more. It rates as one of those things every child should have for bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Kaddypinkette

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! My daughter falls asleep by the second 45 minute interval. The stars do not rotate. The stars change color through fade-in, fade-out style. The product’s physical shape is small and not invasive, nor tacky. The star’s lights are not bright. Just pleasantly dim. Happy baby, happy mommy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnie 5.7

customer_reviews.title: My 2 going on 3 year olds love this! It helped them to start sleeping in ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 going on 3 year olds love this! It helped them to start sleeping in their own room at night (they are twins). It is bright and really projects the stars. It is easy for them to work and it doesn't get overly warm like other products like this. Batteries last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Works! I bought it for my girlfriend for Christmas so obviously I haven't given it to her yet. She is a huge fan of the little Prince AND stars. I tested this out to make sure it works and it works really well. I like it a lot. Just a heads up it does not have batteries so you'll need to get those separately (3AAs) but so far really liking this and can't wait for my girlfriend to open it on Christmas day
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this. We're big fans of Le Petit Prince
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. We're big fans of Le Petit Prince, and I couldn't believe that I just found out about this star projector. We bought it for my son's first birthday, and he LOVES the stars. He's getting his first teeth, and it's the only thing that can make him happy when he's having a meltdown. He loves pointing out the stars, and it's nice for us to look at as well. I love how easy it is to turn on too (you just touch the Little Prince's face).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very basic projector. Great for travel with kids.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome small star projector. Has a built in timer, only takes batteries and my 2 yr old son loves it at home and while on vacation. I bought two, one for him and one for my other son's nursery. It does not play music and has orange, blue and green colors. They can be set individual or the last setting cycles through all colors. Very basic projector = SIMPLE. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kidgalaxy

customer_reviews.title: NO MUSIC
customer_reviews.text: mm not sure if i like it or not! i wish the stars had some kind of movement the plastic is very cheap so i don't know how much it will last and it doesn't have music :(
customer_reviews.author: valentina

customer_reviews.title: Magic!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing. I am an adult child. I turn it on every night before I go to bed and when I am going to sleep I can look up and see stars on my ceiling. It is magic...very calming...very whimsical. I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Sleeping Piranha

customer_reviews.title: Great Night Light
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friends kid and I think the father uses it more than the kid does. It was much smaller than expected but works perfectly from what I'm told. No cords or sharp edges for kids to hurt themselves (or their siblings). I would recommend this product to anyone and will probably buy another for my nephew once he's a little older.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Halbach

customer_reviews.title: and really beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant, quiet, and really beautiful to look at. Has been going strong with no problems for 3 months and battery life is still strong. Auto shut off after 45 minutes three colors to choose from in one unit. Get it if you have not, this is the same unit used in some famous films. Rate O True...."Honest reviews you can count on... Hammer those who deserve it, and praise those who earn it."
customer_reviews.author: Rate O True

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Batteries hold up well. Very bright and I like that it has an option for changing colors. I would like it even better if the stars would spin on the ceiling. My daughter loves it. She is 11 weeks and puts herself to sleep watching the stars on her ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soothing & Lovely
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for over a year and it's still going strong. I purchased this when my son was 9 months old and started having a hard time falling asleep. He loves it so much that I usually have to shut it off so that he WILL sleep. :) It just projects stars onto the ceiling, in various colors or rotates through the colors. We purchased a sound machine separately. (lots of sleep issues here)
customer_reviews.author: krodgers

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy a magical star filled room! Fun & exciting!
customer_reviews.text: Totally fabulous! My child loved the stars lit up all over her room at bedtime. The ability to have it go through all the different colors randomly was fun. And the auto-shut-off timer after 45 mins. was perfect. I only wish it had an ability to plug it in & charge. Versus batteries. But its such a wonderful product that, that is just minor. So now I have bought two. One for each kid.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: It's great that it has an automatic timer and that it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great that it has an automatic timer and that it has a setting where the color of the stars change. But the strength of the projected light is not very strong. Our daughter goes to bed around 7 pm and as it's staying lighter outside later and later, now you can't even really see the stars in the room because of the faint light from outside coming in through the blinds.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J.

customer_reviews.title: What has it to do with Le Petit Prince?!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stars over my baby's bed in the dark. But what a great disappointment when I got the product and realized that that's all it does, and thus has no link with Le Petit Prince!
customer_reviews.author: Sebnem Cecile

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son is finally willing to lay down in his crib without a fight! He loves the changing color mode, and he falls asleep while looking at the stars. The brightness and the clarity of the stars is very nice. We have a small room, and it fills up the entire ceiling and part of the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Project stars on the ceiling!
customer_reviews.text: Rather than buy the sticky glowing stars you have to stick on the ceiling, I opted to have them projected there instead. Easier, cleaner, more options as to color. My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Country Colie

customer_reviews.title: Only battery operated
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My little boy loves it too. The only reason I took a star away is because it's ONLY battery operated. I wish it gives us the choice to use the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind that dimension of this night light is 4.9 x 4.9 x 3.2 inches - so, it is small. I expected it larger and more heavy. Everything else is good, stars bright in choice of 3 colors. This is a gift, I hope my friend will like it
customer_reviews.author: xenia mustuc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent star projector in nursery!
customer_reviews.text: We just love this compact star projector! The stars cover our ceiling and some wall. It makes nighttime so dreamy and peaceful in our little one's room. And our little one loves it too! To see her gaze turn into a smile just seeing the stars up on the ceiling and walls just warm our hearts!
customer_reviews.author: PST

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for a friend who just had a baby and ended up buying a second one for myself because I liked it so much. It is very simple, small and light; it makes the room atmosphere quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great product! The stars are beautiful and it works ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The stars are beautiful and it works very well at night. Very calming, peaceful, and as I am adult who purchased this for my girlfriend and I it is also romantic. On night where it is rainy and cloudy so stargazing is not an option this is a great alternative
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Theiss

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cosmic love it
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes this. I just would like it if they made a rechargeable one
customer_reviews.author: angela sparks

customer_reviews.title: mehh. now after no longer working.
customer_reviews.text: The little one loves the stars. Like that is an auto shut off. update. stoped work. they no longer sell this model. orange light flickers, stays on for a few seconds. changed batteries still doesnt work. child very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Donw

customer_reviews.title: Well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Baby girl (4 years old with mild autism) LOVES this. It calms her when she's trying to go to sleep. She also takes it into different rooms changing the color and ooing and ahhing over it. It's easy to wipe clean and super easy to operate (clearly--a toddler can do it). It's also been dropped a few times in transit and still works like a charm. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this light ... soft glowing stars on the ceiling.  Not just for kids.
customer_reviews.text: This projector gives a beautiful soft light on the ceiling. Though it has 4 different colors, I use the golden color. I liked it so much that I am keeping one for myself and I ordered another one for my grandson. I plan to order another one for a baby gift soon. It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. I bought it to help tighten/cheer up their room and it made a big difference. They like to have the stars on to fall asleep and it makes the room not so scary. I was disappointed at first that it didn’t plug in and only turned on for 45 mins at a time. However, it has worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Good portable nightlight!
customer_reviews.text: I think the stars show up really well in my standard 8 ft high nursery. I just don't like that to turn it on and off there's not a switch but a button that's extremely too easy to press. So I have to be cautious when picking it up to move it around. It also runs on batteries which can be a plus or minus depending on your circumstance. It's super portable but you'll also burn a lot of batteries. We use rechargeable batteries so that helps tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: this is the most amazing gift for a Petit Prince fan
customer_reviews.author: andrea suarez

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Light Especially for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this little light. It's perfect for our daughter and made her really happy when we got it in and put it in her room. We wanted to wait a couple of weeks before leaving a review to make sure we gave a proper one. Everything has been great! I love that it automatically turns off after 45 minutes so you don't waste any more battery than you need. My daughter also loves that she gets to pick the color stars she wants (orange, blue, green, or all 3). I would definitely buy this again and I would recommend it to others also.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Rice Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as a night light. It turns off after 45 minutes, so it won't wake up our 3 year old. His room is pretty dark at night with the black out curtains and the stars show up well and cover most of the ceiling and walls. The light isn't "bright" either. It is sharp and clear, but muted enough that it doesn't keep him awake. He absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Twinkle Twinkle!
customer_reviews.text: We turn these stars on every single night and single twinkle twinkle. The same batteries have lasted for 7 months and the light hasn't dimmed at all. The unit has also been knocked off the bed/night stand and onto the hard wood floors numerous times without breaking. I wish I would have purchased this years ago!!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Best in class
customer_reviews.text: A button would be much better than the touch sensor it uses. But my 4 year old son loves the green and blue color options and we use it every night. This unit is smaller and much lighter than that popular turtle that others buy for more. It is MUCH better for travel, which is why I picked it since he expects to use it wherever we wind up.
customer_reviews.author: CustomerXYZ

customer_reviews.title: Great night light for little one 💕
customer_reviews.text: My daughter seems to love it but I for sure do! It gives just the right amount of light at night to not have to turn on the lights! Definitely recommend! Ps: it doesn't have an extension cord, it uses batteries but it does shut off at 45 min mark so it's perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: Jislem

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: Great night light! Looks pretty in person with light on and off, such a cute little add on decor to a nursery room, and my 1 months old baby have noticed the stars right away after I've turned it on and started starring at them.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It has three color options and four settings, first one amber color, second blue, third green and fourth all of the colors alternating one after the other for about 15 seconds. It is so soothing to look at the stars and it works very well. I like that it is activated by the touch and that it is auto shut off after about 45 minutes. You will need a small screw driver to unscrew the lid to insert 3 AA batteries. I use this item a lot and have had it for about a month and haven't changed the batteries yet.
customer_reviews.author: Alia

customer_reviews.title: Goes where we go.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years. Kids love it and I like the fact that it comes without annoying music. We use it every night at home and take it along on trips for that little piece of home to comfort little ones when we sleep at hotel, friends house etc.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Buettner

customer_reviews.title: Cute star display.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Instructions are clear (regarding how to program the color display). I like the fact that there is a timer (shuts off after 45 minutes). I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cracco

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. My baby loves it! During our nightly routine I take him a bath, give him a bottle, read him a book, and afterwards turn on his light and it's the cherry on top. He loves to stare at it and will doze off. On the days he's fussy I move the light around and he's fascinated by it. I'm so glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old twins love this. They take turns each night picking a color. I've had this for several months and haven't had to replace the batteries yet. It's very easy for travelling as well. I like that it turns off after 45 minutes. They can easily turn it back on themselves if they're still awake when it turns off.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. Love the LPP theme! I've tried a few of these projector lights and many are too bright, with the colors changing too rapidly to serve any soothing effect. The light on this model is soft and each mode is relaxing with just enough effect to be pleasant without being garish. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bartell

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Does just what it says
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Does just what it says, stays on for about 45 min and turns itself off . I took it camping and it was a great light in the tent for chilling out. I like that I can change the color of the stars. Easy to use, I recommend. This would be great in a child's room, a teen or college room, or even an adult.
customer_reviews.author: sfunk

customer_reviews.title: expensive toy very simple functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Works but disappointing. It's pretty expensive for such simple night light (change between color by touch). No moving rotation or any interesting functionality. The toddler loses his interest in it very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: M O

customer_reviews.title: They loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was a present and they loved it for s sweet little boy. The little price book was part of the present.
customer_reviews.author: cathy Eide

customer_reviews.title: Cute and simple
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's nursery. I love the fact that it has a built-in timer that turns off after 45 minutes to conserve the battery. The only down side is that it does not tilt. It was tricky positioning this light to display in a way for my son to see the stars on the ceiling. Other than that, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors especially the green
customer_reviews.text: This is a really pretty light for my babies room. They are under 1 year old and is very fascinated with it. It’s brings a real cozy touch to the room. It lights up the entire ceiling and which is very high. Love it!!! Just wish it could b plugged in and not only use battery apart from that beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: cphmoxatvl

customer_reviews.title: I love it, and my child does too
customer_reviews.text: This needs a button that you can find in the dark. It's damn near impossible to work after you've turned the lights out. Aside from that, I love it, and my child does too.
customer_reviews.author: feebs

customer_reviews.title: Great night light
customer_reviews.text: Awesome night light. I originally bought this for my 9 month old but I love this thing. It is such a pleasant light. The colors are not too bright and it's so nice for both of us to fall asleep to our own little constellation.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: It’s lights up the room nicely and changes in a nice slow way that hyponotizes ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It’s lights up the room nicely and changes in a nice slow way that hyponotizes children to sleep.... usually..... unless they hear the other parent arrive home....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Sweetest Light!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure who loves it more!? My grandson, or me! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: That Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy too. Ours has taken a few trips down ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year loves this at night. Has a built in timer and will turn itself off after an hour. The LED is very bright though so we've taught my son not to stare into it. Very sturdy too. Ours has taken a few trips down the stairs and still works.
customer_reviews.author: Dgr

customer_reviews.title: For the longest time I couldn't figure out how to ...
customer_reviews.text: For the longest time I couldn't figure out how to change the different color settings! hahahaha! You touch the image of the little prince to do so. My son loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. The kids love it. The lights for the stars change colors. It runs for about 45 minutes then turns off automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Barker

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy to use and paints the most gorgeous stars all ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is incredible! It's so easy to use and paints the most gorgeous stars all over our son's room. About the time he turned 3 he suddenly was scared of the dark, and started having nightmares. We got this and a Frozen nightlight and he loves them! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this!! It totally helped with his bedtime routine and helped him to stay in bed because he had these stars to look at on his ceiling that changed color. He's obsessed and he even learned how to say the word 'star' because of it
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Awesome star
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Awesome. Color options. Self timer so it shuts off after period of time to save battery life. Stays on long enuf to fall asleep. Stars are stationery. Does not move. It covers entire ceiling. Highly recommend. I bought two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Creat for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Totally creat! Just what my child asked for. Very easy to use. Shows stars in 4 different colors (which ever you chose) or interchangeable colors (another option). No cord only batteries but lasts a long time. Turns off in 45 minutes. Creates great atmosphere. Can even be used for parties or special get together to light up the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: 3 BEARS

customer_reviews.title: This is our travel night light
customer_reviews.text: We use this to travel with wherever we go. It packs well in a suitcase, and the plastic is easy to clean. We use the twilight turtle at home.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Nice Nightlight for a Star-Filled Room
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our grandkids' rooms. Throws out lots of fun stars and makes a cute nightlight. It does eat up the batteries quickly so stock up. So far it has been durable through some toddler roughhousing.
customer_reviews.author: CozyKat

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome, simple projector and the automatic shut off feature ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome, simple projector and the automatic shut off feature is great. Plus, it’s The Little Prince!
customer_reviews.author: MsV8r

customer_reviews.title: ... lights at night and bought this hoping see would like a darker room but something interesting to look at
customer_reviews.text: I noticed my daughter looking at the lights at night and bought this hoping see would like a darker room but something interesting to look at. She was spellbound and kept her quietly engaged. The only con is that it is difficult to turn off in a dark room. They should have some type of glow in the dark indicator so we easily turn it off instead of waiting for the 45 min auto shut off.
customer_reviews.author: bk2cali

customer_reviews.title: Night light
customer_reviews.text: Really nice little night light but very fragile. Not a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R.

customer_reviews.title: Lighting is dim, even in the darkest of rooms ...
customer_reviews.text: Lighting is dim, even in the darkest of rooms. The image is isolated to a small part of the ceiling, not spreading farther than a 3ft span. Color only changes if YOU press it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I wanted something that didn’t move but just projected stats onto the ceiling and that’s exactly what I got. I kind of wish I went with something that was a sound machine as well, but this does what it says. Not too bad if you’re just wanting something very basic.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Hitt

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: My son has really enjoyed these. They stopped working so I contacted the company. They quickly responded and offered to ship another at no charge. Super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S. Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy
customer_reviews.text: It has four modes: green, orange, blue and switching between all three. Very soft light, my 3mo loves it and so do the two of us. I wish was USB-chargeable though.
customer_reviews.author: green and picky

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat on the pricy side for what it does. I kind of expected more but I like that it's small and it can be easily tucked in the bassinet. Wouldn't really recommend it for this price.
customer_reviews.author: scifi

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with it and my daughter loves it but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with it and my daughter loves it but it has ben few weeks that it doesn't work properly, it used to change the colors of the stars and it doesn't do it anymore and sometimes i can not turn it on. I expected to work longer time, it just barely make it to 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Doongy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but not super bright
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but not super bright. My kids love the stars on the ceiling and gou6ng off after a few hours is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBearBlake

customer_reviews.title: Replaces a Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Baby LOVES this!! Our bassinet doesn’t allow for a mobile to be hung, so we bought this. He stares at it till he falls asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Becker

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful night light
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful night light. The kids love picking the star color or the changing one and the timer is perfect. Batteries last for months and we use it two or three times a day.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Jackson :)

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect nightlight for my 4-year-old
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect nightlight for my 4-year-old. Not too much light to keep him awake, just enough to ease his mind. It projects almost all the way across his ceiling from the dresser across the room. Love that it turns off after 45 minutes so it doesn't run all night while he's asleep and doesn't need it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this product for a month and use it every night. It has a timer so we are still on the same batteries. Only con is that the button is not raised and difficult to find in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: KTeacher

customer_reviews.title: It's really cute and worked fine for the first few months
customer_reviews.text: It's really cute and worked fine for the first few months. Now it won't cycle through the colors. But my son still loves it and we continue to use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: JJ1217

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Wish it had an adapter! Has 4 settings. I use the blue often and the last setting for rotation of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: I love how it turns off automatically after 40
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. Each night it’s different color stars. I love how it turns off automatically after 40 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Our 2 year old loves, loves his stars. ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old loves, loves his stars. We turn them on every night before bed, and he plays with them every morning. This device has been dropped, rolled, and turned on countless times- shows no wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: mamarae

customer_reviews.title: I love that its portable and he can have his starry ...
customer_reviews.text: My little prince adores this month old and goes crazy for these stars. We use it as a nighttime ritual for bedtime. I love that its portable and he can have his starry playtime anywhere . I myself am mesmerized at times . Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Tried several kinds of new batteries. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: slcroro

product_meta.title: "Touch Active, Easy Clean" Twilight Constellation Galaxy Round Projector Night Light by Lumitusi (Le Petit Prince)
feature_bullets: Elly Touch Activated, Round Projector night light gently transforms nurseries and bedrooms into a starry sanctuary that comforts and calms children.
Efficient multi-coloured LEDs project a dazzling array of stars onto bedroom ceilings and walls
Choose between 4 different LED colour settings - Orange, Blue, Green and auto colour changing mode ¨C via a touch-activated region on the shell body
3 x AA batteries provide 60+ nights of sleep time; based on 45 minutes of usage per night
Easy to clean, designed with children in mind - High impact plastic construction; ROHS compliant; screw type lock prevents infants from accidentally accessing the battery compartment

specifications.Material Type: BPA Free, Phthalate Free, Latex Free, Lead Free
specifications.Material free: BPA Free, Lead Free, Phthalate Free
